org.greatage.ioc
Interface OrderedConfiguration<V>

Type Parameters:
V - type of configuration items
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderedConfigurationImpl
public interface OrderedConfiguration<V>

This class represent ordered service configuration that is used by service contributors to configure service instance. All items will be ordered by their order constraints in Ordered style. It is injected to service resources as an ordered list of items at build time.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik
See Also:
OrderingUtils

Method Summary
 OrderedConfiguration<V> add(V item, java.lang.String orderId, java.lang.String... constraints)
          Adds simple item to service configuration according to its order constrains.
 OrderedConfiguration<V> addInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends V> itemClass, java.lang.String orderId, java.lang.String... constraints)
          Instantiates instance of specified class with all injected dependencies and adds this item to service configuration according to its order constrains.

                            java.lang.String orderId,

addInstance

OrderedConfiguration<V> addInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends V> itemClass,
                                    java.lang.String orderId,
                                    java.lang.String... constraints)
Instantiates instance of specified class with all injected dependencies and adds this item to service configuration according to its order constrains.

Parameters:
itemClass - item class
orderId - unique order id
constraints - order constraints
Returns:
this configuration instance
